titleStmt.title: The fourme of the proclamations to be published in the port townes, and market townes, or other publique places, within the limittes of the commission geuen by the Queenes Maiestie, the first of March, 1571. to sundry persons of credite, for reformation of disorders vpon the sea coastes
Proclamations. 1572
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: A proclamation expelling pirates and prohibiting aid to them.
At bottom of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
